name: Silver Legacy Deluxe Spa Suite – 1 King
description: Indulge in the Silver Legacy Deluxe Spa Suite with 1 King bed — a private spa room offering modern amenities, spacious comfort, and breathtaking views of downtown Reno and the Sierra Nevada. The jetted spa tub and luxury finishes make it the perfect room for a golfer's retreat.
shortDescription: Silver Legacy Deluxe Spa Suite with King bed, jetted tub, and downtown Reno views.

faqs.question: Does the Deluxe Spa Suite have a jetted tub?
faqs.answer: Yes — an in-room jetted spa tub plus a king bed and panoramic downtown Reno views.

faqs.question: Can Golf the High Sierra book spa suites for groups?
faqs.answer: Yes — we can block multiple Deluxe Spa Suites at group rates as part of a complete golf package.

testimonials.quote: Treated myself to the Deluxe Spa Suite at Silver Legacy. Jetted tub, king bed, incredible views. Perfect golf trip splurge.
testimonials.author: Tom R.

testimonials.quote: GTHS booked the spa suite for our group leaders — they loved it. Great upgrade from a standard room at a very reasonable rate.
testimonials.author: Paul S.
